actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4 of the Act entitled "An Act to provide for the alteration of certain bridges over navigable waters of the United States, for the apportionment of the cost of such alterations between the United States and the owners of such bridges, and for other purposes" to extend its coverage to the alteration of additional bridges over navigable waters of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the owners of bridges over navigable waters of the United States to submit to the Secretary of Transportation for approval general plans and specifications to provide for such alteration of any bridge as the bridge owner may desire to meet the necessities of railroad or highway traffic, or both. (Amends 33 U.S.C. 514)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4 of the Act entitled "An Act to provide for the alteration of certain bridges over navigable waters of the United States, for the apportionment of the cost of such alterations between the United States and the owners of such bridges, and for other purposes" to extend its coverage to the alteration of additional bridges over navigable waters of the United States.
